data.message: Implement Phase 1B: semantic search with graceful degradation: Completed: Created migration system (001_add_vectors.py), FTS5 search working, hybrid search infrastructure ready. System operates in FTS-only mode (sqlite-vec not installed). Added duro_semantic_search and duro_run_migration tools. Ranking config with RRF fusion, type weights, recency boost implemented.
data.task: Implement Phase 1B: semantic search with graceful degradation
data.outcome: Completed: Created migration system (001_add_vectors.py), FTS5 search working, hybrid search infrastructure ready. System operates in FTS-only mode (sqlite-vec not installed). Added duro_semantic_search and duro_run_migration tools. Ranking config with RRF fusion, type weights, recency boost implemented.
